metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36317 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
When visiting a website with an overly long URL, the user interface wouldstart to hang. Due to session restore, this could lead to a permanentDenial of Service.
*This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox <103.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
